'''2.15.19''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on December 15, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Added "Tips for Beginners" link in Help menu under account name.

== Fixes ==
* Fixes to News article sorting.
* Realms display & pass through functionality bug fixes.
* Soothing Scene (video/audio) bug fixes & UI updates.
